source.name: RSS Feeds for Severe Weather Advisories
source.description: The National Weather Service (NWS)  uses RSS feeds to disseminate severe weather advisories.  These RSS feeds are regularly updated and include the following advisories:  flood ; hazardous  seas; winter weather and  storm ; high wind ; small craft;  hurricane;  tornado;  fog ; red flag ; freeze and frost ; special weather statements, etc.
